description: News about Zacarias Moussaoui, including commentary and archival articles published in The New York Times.
title: Zacarias Moussaoui
title_page: Zacarias Moussaoui - The New York Times
maintext:
Moussaoui Calls Saudi Princes Patrons of Al Qaeda
Zacarias Moussaoui, a former Qaeda operative, said that members of the royal family were donors in the 1990s, and that he discussed plans to shoot down Air Force One with a staff member at the Saudi Embassy.
